title: GRVL Grumbles: Local Landowners Asking for Change in Steamboat Springs
content:
SBT GRVL's organizers have promised to address their rural neighbors' concerns with new routes, signage, portapotties, and more.

Read the full article at GRVL Grumbles: Local Landowners Asking for Change in Steamboat Springs on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
